opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Medical Board of California v. Hason

opinion:
537 U.S. 1028

MEDICAL BOARD OF CALIFORNIA
v.
HASON.

No. 02-479.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 18, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE NINTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 9th Cir. Motion of the United States for leave to intervene granted. Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition. Reported below: 279 F. 3d 1167.
